item.title: UK Economy: Will There Be a Recession in 2023?
item.description: UK Economy: Will There Be a Recession in 2023? The UK economy is facing a number of headwinds, including rising inflation, the war in Ukraine, and the cost of living crisis. Economists are increasingly concerned that the UK could enter a recession in 2023.
